scripts.dev: if [ "$NODE_ENV" = "production" ]; then concurrently "yarn workspace cloud dev" "yarn workspace client dev"; else concurrently "yarn workspace api dev" "yarn workspace client dev"; fi
scripts.dev:api: concurrently "yarn workspace api dev" "yarn workspace client dev"
scripts.dev:cloud: concurrently "yarn workspace cloud dev:full" "VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:3000 yarn workspace client dev"
scripts.build: yarn workspace @rtk-query-demo/types build && yarn workspace client build
scripts.build:all: yarn workspace @rtk-query-demo/types build && yarn workspace api build && yarn workspace cloud build && yarn workspace client build
scripts.build:cloud: yarn workspace @rtk-query-demo/types build && yarn workspace cloud build && yarn workspace client build
